text: Tamen zu zhong de shizhe shuo:“Nandao duiyu zhenzhu ──tiandi de chuangzao zhe ──hai you huaiyi ma? Ta haozhao nimen xingshan, yibian ta raoshu nimen de zuiguo, bing dui nimen huanxing dao yige dingqi.” Tamen shuo:“Nimen zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren, nimen yu zuzhi women chongbai women de zuxian suo chongbai de (ouxiang), nimen zhaoshi women yige mingzheng ba!”
